name: Enter the TBA
description:
Play in full screen mode to get the full experience of the game (and display the menus correctly).

Move: WASD

Shoot: Space

Move around and don't let the zombies get you! Beat your own score in a randomly generated dungeon every time you play.

Download the PC version for the best experience! (EnterTheTBA_PC.zip).

Note: the game might run slow in the browser.
